items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice && elegant
items.body: The Dress Is Very Stretchy, comfortable and cute! I wore it to a tea party && received so many compliments on the dress. The quality is also nice and it fits perfect! I got a size large. Read more
items.author: Aspen Yearling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY FLATTERING
items.body: Im 5'6" 165-170# 36F and the medium fit me well. Its VERY flattering! Comoflouges a flat butt and makes you more hourglass than you currently are ( somehow). It hides a belly pudge pretty well bc of the raised pattern in the black fabric. Quality is good. So cute with black riding boots! You dont want it stretched to max capacity as that might ruin the flattering effect. Read more
items.author: Houndymama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute dress, true to size.
items.body: This dress is so cute! Perfect fit. Looks more expensive than it was. Fits in a flattering way. Read more
items.author: Gloria S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute
items.body: Great dress, got several comments, paired with knee boots and a red crossbody. I saw a similar more expensive dress that I couldn't get delivered in time, this was a great alternative and cheaper! The top has texture which makes it more interesting Read more
items.author: Chavon Phillips

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little short

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a winery!
items.body: It was very breatheable and flattering! I was very comfortable even in the heat! It has a lot of room to stretch. You most definitely get your moneys worth. For the price, there’s no reason not to get this dress. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black and White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
